meta.title: Automated Gifting System
meta.description: Never miss a birthday or anniversary again. Learn how to delegate gift research, procurement, and logistics to your EA so you only spend 30 seconds picking the perfect option.

hero.headline: Turn Thoughtfulness into a System
hero.subheadline: Stop scrambling for last-minute gift cards. Use your EA to curate personal, high-impact gifts that strengthen your most important relationships.
hero.value_prop: This system moves you from reactive 'emergency' gifting to a proactive strategy where your only job is to reply with a number to a curated list of options.

tools.name: Airtable
tools.description: Used for tracking recipient profiles, dates, and gift history.

tools.name: Handwrytten
tools.description: Service for sending real pen-and-ink notes at scale.

tools.name: 1Password
tools.description: Securely share credit card details with your EA for purchases.

before.title: Reactive Gifting
pain_points: Realizing it's a birthday at 4 PM and sending a generic Amazon gift card.
Spending 2 hours browsing gift sites when you should be working.
The anxiety of potentially sending the same gift twice.
Missing key milestones for high-value business partners.

after.title: Strategic Thoughtfulness
benefits: Every gift is personalized and arrives 2 days early.
Your total time investment is 30 seconds of decision-making.
Your reputation for being 'thoughtful' and 'detail-oriented' grows.
A complete history of every gift ever sent is at your fingertips.

items.label: Recipient Profile
items.value: Name, relationship type (Personal/Business), and shipping address.

items.label: Key Dates
items.value: Birthdays, anniversaries, or annual company milestones.

items.label: Preferences
items.value: Dietary restrictions, favorite colors, hobbies, and 'never-gift' items.

items.label: Gift History
items.value: Date, item sent, and recipient reaction to avoid repeats.

callout.content: Have your EA set up this database in Notion or Airtable. It serves as the single source of truth for all relationship management.

items.label: EA Proactive Alert
items.details: 14 days before an event, your EA sends a Slack/message with 3 curated gift options based on the recipient's profile.

items.label: The 'Reply with a Number' Choice
items.details: You review the options and reply with 'Option 2'. If a personal note is needed, you dictate it via voice memo or quick text.

items.label: EA Fulfillment
items.details: Your EA handles the purchase, gift wrapping, card writing, and tracking.

items.label: Delivery Confirmation
items.details: Your EA notifies you once the gift has been delivered so you can follow up with a personal text if desired.

callout.content: EA: 'Hi! Your co-founderâ€™s birthday is in 2 weeks. Here are 3 options: 1) Ember Travel Mug (he loves coffee), 2) High-end leather notebook (he's a tactile planner), 3) Donation to [Local Charity] in his name. Which should I proceed with?'

items.label: Share Payment Access
items.details: Provide a dedicated credit card or access via a secure vault like 1Password for purchases.

items.label: Define 'Personal Touch' Rules
items.details: Tell your EA when you want to hand-write a note vs. when they should use a high-quality handwriting service (e.g., Handwrytten).

items.label: Establish 'Always-In-Stock' Items
items.details: Keep a small inventory of generic high-quality items (e.g., branded Moleskines or luxury candles) for unexpected 'Thank You' moments.

content.text: Your system should be robust enough to handle exceptions without your direct involvement. For **International Shipping**, instruct your EA to find local vendors in the recipient's country to avoid customs delays and high fees. For **Corporate Limits**, ensure your EA has a list of gift ceilings for specific clients or partners to remain compliant with their internal policies. In the case of **Last-Minute Needs**, define a 'Rush Protocol' where the EA defaults to high-end local delivery (like a premium florist or local courier) if the lead time is under 48 hours.

callout.content: Always have your EA verify dietary restrictions before sending food-based gifts, especially for corporate recipients.

faq.question: How do I ensure the gifts don't feel 'automated'?
faq.answer: The automation is in the *logistics*, not the *thought*. Your EA uses the preferences you've provided to find items you would have picked yourself if you had the time. Adding a dictated personal note ensures the emotional connection remains authentic.

faq.question: What if my EA picks something I don't like?
faq.answer: The 'Reply with a Number' paradigm gives you final veto power. If none of the 3 options work, simply say 'None of these, find something more [minimalist/practical/creative].' This calibrates your EA's taste for the next time.

faq.question: How do we handle shipping to people whose addresses I don't have?
faq.answer: Your EA can use services like **Paperless Post** to send a 'gift notification' that allows the recipient to securely enter their own shipping address, or they can perform a 'soft reach out' to the recipient's assistant or office manager.
